document_data.name: Indeema
document_data.mainbody: '''Indeema''' was a [[halfling]] [[cleric]] living on [[Jazayir al-Alfar]] in the [[Crowded Sea]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}} She was the ruler of a tribe of halfings called the [[Tarangu]].
document_data.Description: Indeema was overweight and heavily tanned. She had an ample supply of freckles.
document_data.Activities: Indeema served as the ruler of the Tarangu and a cleric of the crab god [[Kar'r'rga]]. She supervised all sacrifices made to the god which usually consisted of offerings left along the lagoon. Most of the time these offerings were consumed by animals inhabiting the region, but sometimes Kar'r'rga would come ashore and claim the offering and a halfling victim if the mood suited him.
